attributes.action: Not introduce advanced British standard qualification.
attributes.additional_details: Because it's a waste of resources and money and none of the students have asked for it- considering they will be the affected group, it makes no sense to pass something they can't vote on. Some students can't do English or Maths because of genuine problems like dyslexia and are disadvantaged, introducing this system of education is aiming to weed out those bad at English and Maths in an ableist way. Preventing those good at other subjects from thriving in careers. These new changes aren't wanted
attributes.background: Prevent this from going through or at least allow input from affected groups.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not introduce a new 'Advanced British Standard Qualification': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647461

Do not make Mathematics and English a requirement up to 18: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647430
